Title: Hakkunde
Writer: Tomi Adesina, Oluseyi Asurf, Jesurobo-Owie Gift Imafidon
Actors: Toyin Aimakhu-Johnson, Seyilaw, Ali Nuhu, Tunbosun Aiyedehin
Plot: HAKKUNDE IS AN INTRIGUING STORY OF A YOUNG GRADUATE WHO BATTLES EVERYTHING ON HIS JOURNEY TO SELF DISCOVERY AND ACTUALIZATION. The story is characterized by actions and reactions that ...
